questions: What are the benefits of SIL's Vision and Scale-up consulting module?
answers: The benefits of SIL's Vision and Scale-up consulting module include defining a Mission, Vision, and Values for your company that play a crucial role in the strategy for taking it forward, understanding the critical difference between ‘start-up’ and ‘scaling up’ for avoiding the mistake of using the same approach for both, gaining clarity in your driving forces for scaling up

questions: What is the use of SIL's goverment bidding consulting module?
answers: The benefits of SIL's government bidding consultancy include perfecting your bidding skills to gain a lead over the competition, targeting your bids on viability to invest time in only those bids that are relevant to your business, and acquiring end-to-end bid management skills with the step-by-step guidance of the navigator.

questions: What is the use of SIL's cost control module?
answers: The benefits of SIL's cost control module include improved decision-making based on factual data, effective quotation preparation considering comprehensive costs, enhanced cost control, and better cash flow management.

questions: Which groups are focused in SIL's employee development journey?
answers: The focus groups identified by SIL for Employee Development Journeys are customer-facing staff, rising stars, managers and supervisors, and blue-collar employees.

questions: Which skills will SIL train the comapnay facing staff on?
answers: SIL will train the company-facing staff on three skills: selling skills, email and telephone etiquette, and customer service.

questions: What are the skills that SIL will train the company-facing staff on?
answers: SIL will train the company-facing staff on three skills: selling skills, email and telephone etiquette, and customer service.

questions: What is the use of selling skills module of SIL?
answers: The company-facing staff will learn to prepare a sales call, move from transactional sales to relationship-oriented sales, identify the needs of customers, avoid product pedaling and provide the client with a solution, objection handling skills, tactics of closing and negotiation, and 7-Day follow-up on all important sales closure under the selling skills training module.

questions: What will the company-facing staff learn under the selling skills training module?
answers: The company-facing staff will learn to prepare a sales call, move from transactional sales to relationship-oriented sales, identify the needs of customers, avoid product pedaling and provide the client with a solution, objection handling skills, tactics of closing and negotiation, and 7-Day follow-up on all important sales closure under the selling skills training module.

questions: What is the use of customer service module of SIL?
answers: The company-facing staff will learn to develop a customer-centric attitude, recognize your customers, 6 basic customer needs, the difference between Responsibility and Accountability, resolution of customer queries, and create customer delight under the customer service training module.

questions: What will the company-facing staff learn under the customer service training module?

questions: What is the aim of customer service training module?
answers: The ultimate goal of the customer service training module for the company-facing staff is to create customer delight.

questions: Who is Dr. Yogesh Pawar?
answers: Dr. Yogesh Pawar is Managing Partner & Co-Founder Business Integration Group - School of Inspirational Leadership,one of Asia’s top leadership and business strategy authorities, holding a Ph.D. in Predictive Psychology.

questions: What is the vision of SIL?
answers: By 2026, SIL will be one of the finest EdTech & Consulting organizations that brings inspiration and innovative solutions to the lives of 1,00,000+ learners globally.

questions: What is the purpose of SIL?
answers: To educate, invite and spread wisdom from all quarters of life and encourage entrepreneurship through handholding.

questions: What are the core values of SIL?
answers: Continuous Improvement, Innovation, Inspire to Aspire, Courage, Dynamism are the core values at SIL.

questions: What are SIL's learning solutions?
answers: Business Transformation Journeys, Life Transformation, Employee Development Journeys are some learning solution offered by SIL.

questions: What is the splash model?
answers: The splash model is a Talent Mangement and Organizational Development Consulting which impacts Systems, Processes, Learning, Attitude, Skills and Habits hence, named splash.

questions: What is modular consulting?
answers: Modular Consulting allows you to choose the areas of your business where you need support from SIL to strengthen it.

questions: In which areas we can avail modular consulting?
answers: We can avail modular consulting in following areas, Sales & Sales Management, Lean Management, Finance, Leadership & People, Vision, Strategy & Scale-up, Government Bidding, and Cost Control.

questions: What is aarambh?
answers: Aarambh is a one-of-its-kind industry event for entrepreneurs gearing up to take up new opportunities in the coming year. This event will help you build a robust roadmap with an Annual Operating Plan personalized for your business.

questions: What is SIL university?
answers: SIL University is an all-encompassing ecosystem for impactful and wholesome personal and professional development.It offers specialized professional and personal transformation journeys covering various areas, under one roof, and makes them available globally.
